CAGEscanFindMolecules.string_process:
process CAGEscanFindMolecules {
    container = 'cagescan/cagescan-pipeline:2020072701'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/find-molecules",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    if (! params.count ) params.count = 2
    input:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(reads1),
              path(reads2)
    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(reads1),
              path(reads2),
              path("*.molecules.txt"),
              emit: CAGEscanMolecules
    script:
    command = """
        cagescan-find-molecules.sh -d 1 -g 0.5 -n ${params.count} -p 20 ${reads1} > ${sampleName}.molecules.txt
        """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] CAGEscan find-molecules command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: COMMAND
tools_dico.description: Web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases.

directive: publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/find-molecules" , mode: "copy", overwrite: true if (! params.count ) params.count = 2

CAGEscanAssemble.string_process:
process CAGEscanAssemble {
    container = 'cagescan/cagescan-pipeline:2020072701'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/assemble",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    input:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(reads1),
              path(reads2),
              path(molecules)
    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path("*.assembled.fq"),
              emit: CAGEscanAssembled
    script:
    command = """
        cagescan-assemble.sh ${reads1} ${reads2} ${molecules} > ${sampleName}.assembled.fq
        """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] CAGEscan assemble command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: COMMAND
tools_dico.description: Web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases.

CAGEscanMap.string_process:
process CAGEscanMap {

                                
        cpus 6
       

    container = 'cagescan/cagescan-pipeline:2020072701'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/map",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    input:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(assembled)
        path(index)

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path("*.maf"),
              emit: CAGEscanMapped
    script:
    command = """
        cagescan-map.sh ${index}/index ${assembled} > ${sampleName}.maf
        """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] CAGEscan map command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

tools_dico.description: Web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases.

CAGEscanCountHits.string_process:
process CAGEscanCountHits {
    container = 'cagescan/cagescan-pipeline:2020072701'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/hits",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    input:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(mapped)

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path("*.hits.txt"),
              emit: CAGEscanCountedHits
    script:
    command = """
        cagescan-count-hits.sh ${mapped} |
           awk '{print \$0 "\t${sampleName}"}' > "${sampleName}".hits.txt
        """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] CAGEscan count hits command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

tools_dico.name: COMMAND
tools_dico.description: Web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases.

CAGEscanBuildTranscripts.string_process:
process CAGEscanBuildTranscripts {
    container = 'cagescan/cagescan-pipeline:2020072701'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/transcripts",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    input:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(mapped)

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path("*.transcripts.txt"),
              emit: CAGEscanCountedHits
    script:
    command = """
        cagescan-build-transcripts.py -b20 -m0.001 ${mapped} > ${sampleName}.transcripts.txt
        """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] CAGEscan build transcripts command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

CAGEscanConvertToBED12.string_process:
process CAGEscanConvertToBED12 {
    container = 'cagescan/cagescan-pipeline:2020072701'
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/CAGEscan/BED12",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    input:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path(transcripts)

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
              path("*.bed"),
              emit: CAGEscanBED12
    script:
    command = """
        cagescan-to-bed.py -s1e6 ${transcripts} |
           sort -k1,1 -k2,2n -k3,3n -k4,4 -k6,6 > ${sampleName}.bed
        """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] CAGEscan convert to BED12 command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

tools_dico.description: Web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases.

bbmap_clumpify.string_process:
process bbmap_clumpify {

    container = 'cagescan/bbmap:38.86'

    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bbmap/clumpify",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true

    input:
        tuple val(sampleName), path(reads1), path(reads2)

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
        path("*dedupR1.fastq.gz"),
        path("*dedupR2.fastq.gz"),
        emit: dedupFastqFiles

    script:

    command =
    """
    clumpify.sh \
        in=$reads1 \
        in2=$reads2 \
        out=${sampleName}_dedupR1.fastq.gz \
        out2=${sampleName}_dedupR2.fastq.gz \
        dedupe=t \
        shortname=t \
        addcount=t
    """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] BBMap/clumpify command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}
bbmap_clumpify.string_script:
command =
    """
    clumpify.sh \
        in=$reads1 \
        in2=$reads2 \
        out=${sampleName}_dedupR1.fastq.gz \
        out2=${sampleName}_dedupR2.fastq.gz \
        dedupe=t \
        shortname=t \
        addcount=t
    """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] BBMap/clumpify command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """

bbmap_minlen.string_process:
process bbmap_minlen {

    container = 'cagescan/bbmap:38.86'

    publishDir "${params.outdir}/bbmap/minlen",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true

    input:
        tuple val(sampleName), path(reads1), path(reads2)

    if (!params.minlength) { params.minlength = 28 }

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName),
        path("*minlenR1.fastq.gz"),
        path("*minlenR2.fastq.gz"),
        emit: minlenFastqFiles

    script:

    command = """
        bbduk.sh \
            in=$reads1 \
            in2=$reads2 \
            out=${sampleName}_minlenR1.fastq.gz \
            out2=${sampleName}_minlenR2.fastq.gz \
            minlen=${params.minlength}
         """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] BBDuk minlen command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}

gunzip.string_process:
process gunzip {
    publishDir "${params.outdir}/unzip", mode: "copy", overwrite: true
    input:  tuple val(sName), path(fastqgz1), path(fastqgz2)
    output: tuple val(sName), path("*R1.fastq"), path("*R2.fastq"), emit: gunzipped
    script:
    """
    zcat ${fastqgz1} > ${sName}.gunzipped.R1.fastq
    zcat ${fastqgz2} > ${sName}.gunzipped.R2.fastq
    """
}
directive: publishDir "${params.outdir}/unzip", mode: "copy", overwrite: true input: tuple val(sName), path(fastqgz1), path(fastqgz2) output: tuple val(sName), path("*R1.fastq"), path("*R2.fastq"), emit: gunzipped

hello1.string_process:
process hello1 {
	input: val(input1)
	script:
	"""
	echo $input1
	ls $input1
	"""
}

hello3.string_process:
process hello3 {
	input: tuple val(input1), val(input2), val(input3)
	script:
	"""
	echo $input1
	ls $input2
	ls $input3
	"""
}

listOfFiles.string_process:
process listOfFiles {
	input: path(files)
	output: path("*", includeInputs = true)
	script:
	"""
	echo hello
	"""
}

TagDust2.string_process:
process TagDust2 {

    container = 'cagescan/tagdust2:2020071401'

    publishDir "${params.outdir}/tagdust2",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true

    input:
        tuple val(sampleName), path(reads1), path(reads2)
        path(tagdust_arch)
        path(tagdust_ref)

    output:
                                                                                               
        path "*_BC_*_READ1.fq", emit: demultiplexedFastqFilesR1
        path "*_BC_*_READ2.fq", emit: demultiplexedFastqFilesR2
        path "*_logfile.txt",   emit: TagDust2LogFile

    script:

                                                                           
    command = """
        tagdust                            \
            -show_finger_seq               \
            -ref $tagdust_ref              \
            -arch $tagdust_arch            \
            -o ${sampleName}               \
            ${reads1}                      \
            ${reads2}                      \
         """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] TagDust2 command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """
}
TagDust2.string_script:
command = """
        tagdust                            \
            -show_finger_seq               \
            -ref $tagdust_ref              \
            -arch $tagdust_arch            \
            -o ${sampleName}               \
            ${reads1}                      \
            ${reads2}                      \
         """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] TagDust2 command: " + command)
    }

    """
    ${command}
    """

tools_dico.name: COMMAND
tools_dico.description: Web-based application used to download, collect and manage gene expression data from public databases.

tools_dico.name: TagDust
tools_dico.description: TagDust, a program identifying artifactual sequences in large sequencing runs. Given a user-defined cutoff for the false discovery rate (FDR), TagDust identifies all reads explainable by combinations and partial matches to known sequences used during library preparation.

TagDust2_filter_ref.string_process:
process TagDust2_filter_ref {
    container = 'cagescan/tagdust2:2020071401'

    if (!params.outsubdir) { params.outsubdir = "tagdust2" }

    publishDir "${params.outdir}/${params.outsubdir}",
        mode: "copy", overwrite: true

    input:
        tuple val(sampleName), path(reads1), path(reads2)
        path(tagdust_ref)

    output:
        tuple val(sampleName), path("${sampleName}_READ1.fq"), path("${sampleName}_READ2.fq"), emit: fastqPairs
        path "*_logfile.txt",   emit: TagDust2LogFile

    script:

    command = """
        tagdust                            \
            -ref $tagdust_ref              \
            -arch trivial.arch             \
            -o ${sampleName}               \
            ${reads1}                      \
            ${reads2}                      \
         """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] TagDust2_filter_ref command: " + command)
    }

    """
    printf 'tagdust -1 R:N\n' > trivial.arch
    ${command}
    """
}
TagDust2_filter_ref.string_script:
command = """
        tagdust                            \
            -ref $tagdust_ref              \
            -arch trivial.arch             \
            -o ${sampleName}               \
            ${reads1}                      \
            ${reads2}                      \
         """

    if (params.verbose){
        println ("[MODULE] TagDust2_filter_ref command: " + command)
    }

    """
    printf 'tagdust -1 R:N\n' > trivial.arch
    ${command}
    """

TagDust2_multiplex2arch.string_process:
process TagDust2_multiplex2arch {
  publishDir "${params.outdir}/tagdust2",
    mode: "copy", overwrite: true

  input:
    tuple val(sampleName), path(reads1), path(reads2)
    val(multiplexFile)

  output:
    tuple val(sampleName), path(reads1, includeInputs:true), path(reads2, includeInputs:true), emit: fastqPairs
    path "tagdust.arch", emit: arch

  shell:
  '''
    BARCODES=$(awk -v idx=!{sampleName} '$4 ~ idx {print $3}' !{multiplexFile})
    BARCODES=$(echo $BARCODES | sed 's/ /,/g') # Bashism ?
    cat > tagdust.arch <<__END__
    tagdust -1 B:$BARCODES -2 F:NNNNNNNN -3 S:TATAGGG -4 R:N
    tagdust -1 R:N
    __END__
  '''
}
TagDust2_multiplex2arch.string_script:
'''
    BARCODES=$(awk -v idx=!{sampleName} '$4 ~ idx {print $3}' !{multiplexFile})
    BARCODES=$(echo $BARCODES | sed 's/ /,/g') # Bashism ?
    cat > tagdust.arch <<__END__
    tagdust -1 B:$BARCODES -2 F:NNNNNNNN -3 S:TATAGGG -4 R:N
    tagdust -1 R:N
    __END__
  '''

tools_dico.name: TagDust
tools_dico.description: TagDust, a program identifying artifactual sequences in large sequencing runs. Given a user-defined cutoff for the false discovery rate (FDR), TagDust identifies all reads explainable by combinations and partial matches to known sequences used during library preparation.

TagDust2_associateWithSampleName.string_process:
process TagDust2_associateWithSampleName {
  input:
    path(reads1)
    path(reads2)
    val(multiplexFile)
  output:
    tuple env(SAMPLENAME), path(reads1), path(reads2), emit: fastqPairs
  shell:
  '''
  IDX1=$(echo !{reads1} | sed -e 's/_BC.*//')
  IDX2=$(echo !{reads2} | sed -e 's/_BC.*//')
  [ $IDX1 = $IDX2 ] || exit 1
  BARCODE1=$(echo !{reads1} | sed -e 's/.*BC_//' -e 's/_.*//')
  BARCODE2=$(echo !{reads2} | sed -e 's/.*BC_//' -e 's/_.*//')
  [ $BARCODE1 = $BARCODE2 ] || exit 1
  SAMPLENAME=$(awk -v idx=$IDX1 -v barcode=$BARCODE1 '$4 ~ idx && $3 == barcode {print $1}' !{multiplexFile})
  '''
}
TagDust2_associateWithSampleName.string_script:
'''
  IDX1=$(echo !{reads1} | sed -e 's/_BC.*//')
  IDX2=$(echo !{reads2} | sed -e 's/_BC.*//')
  [ $IDX1 = $IDX2 ] || exit 1
  BARCODE1=$(echo !{reads1} | sed -e 's/.*BC_//' -e 's/_.*//')
  BARCODE2=$(echo !{reads2} | sed -e 's/.*BC_//' -e 's/_.*//')
  [ $BARCODE1 = $BARCODE2 ] || exit 1
  SAMPLENAME=$(awk -v idx=$IDX1 -v barcode=$BARCODE1 '$4 ~ idx && $3 == barcode {print $1}' !{multiplexFile})
  '''
